stripped_text: Conundrum has +3 strength if there is an installed AI. Subroutine The Runner trashes an installed program. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine End the run.
text: Conundrum has +3 strength if there is an installed AI. [subroutine] The Runner trashes an installed program. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Conundrum
